title: love
comment: A caring commitment, in which affection and delight are shown to others, which is grounded in the nature of God himself. In his words and actions, and supremely in the death of Jesus Christ on the cross, God demonstrates the nature of love and defines the direction in which human love in all its forms should develop.

children.title: love, nature of
children.comment: Scripture offers an understanding of the source, character and value of love, based on the nature and actions of God.

children.title: God is the source of love
The love of God is revealed in the cross of Jesus Christ
Love is part of the Holy Spirit's fruit

To describe love expressed by eating together
To describe love in a negative sense
love, for God
children.comment: Scripture teaches believers to love God and shows how such love should be expressed in worship and practical service.

children.title: Loving God involves loving Jesus Christ
Delight in worship and in God's house
Examples of love for God and Jesus Christ
love, for one another
children.comment: Scripture instructs God's people to love one another and illustrates what this means in practice.

seealsos.comment: Jesus Christ commands his disciples to love one another

children.title: God has taken the initiative in showing love
God's people are known by their love

secondaryrefs.comment: the Roman centurion for his servant

children.title: love, in relationships
children.comment: Human love is ennobled by being patterned on God's love for his people. It is also safeguarded by God's commands.

children.title: The love between husband and wife
It is patterned on God's love for his people
Examples of love in courtship and marriage
love, and the world
children.comment: Scripture promotes the love of family, home and country and contains many examples of such love.

children.title: love, and enemies
children.comment: God loves even those who oppose him and believers must follow his example in loving their enemies.

children.title: God's people must love their enemies
love, abuse of
children.comment: Scripture warns that love can be misdirected and shows a number of examples.
